results.title: In between
results.creator_credit: Chris Warner, Kim Dalton and Mandy Smith
results.brief_description: A mini series of four one-hour episodes, each of which concentrates primarly on one of the four major characters (Fatima, Saret, Angie and Alex) but also, advances the stories of three other characters. We learn of their relationships with friends and neighbours,their families and their workplaces.

results.title: In balance
results.brief_description: Two brothers who are partners in a fishing boat business discuss how the profits of their partnership should be managed and from this discussion two points of view emerge. Others enter into the argument and present illustrations of a balanced management of profits. The film describes various ways in which the profits of a company may be used presenting views of employees, shareholders and management.

results.title: In all weathers
results.creator_credit: Basic Films, R.K. Neilson Baxter and John Rhodes
results.brief_description: One of the greatest hazards in marine navigation, poor visibility, has in the past caused much loss of time, money and often life. Before the advent of radar the problem was without solution. This film explains the history of radar, the difficulties faced and overcome in its adaption to marine operation, and finally its inestimable value as a navigational aid.

results.title: In all seasons
results.creator_credit: ONF | NFB, Desmond Dew and Ernest Reid
results.brief_description: The Atmospheric Environment Service (AES) is Canada’s weather bureau. The AES supplies weather forecasts and information on climate patterns. Our well-being depends on a knowledge of the weather. This film shows the AES in operation in a country where there are “four seasons - every week.”

results.title: In a year of 13 moons = In Einem jahr mit
results.brief_description: Erwin Weishaupt made the ultimate sacrifice in pursuit of a lover - impulsively flying to Casablanca for a sex-change operation following a casual remark by Anton, the man he had fallen in love with. Rejected by Anton, and by her latest lover Christoph in the film’s opening scenes, Elwin - now Elvira - is befriended by a young prostitute, Zora, who provides a sympathetic ear for her strange, sad story. In his most personal film, which he wrote, directed, edited, photographed and produced, Fassbinder takes us through the last days of Elvira’s life with his unique brand of dark humour and satire, yet with great tenderness towards his hero/heroine. In German with English subtitles.

results.title: In a rehearsal room
results.creator_credit: Otter Productions and David W. Hahn
results.brief_description: In Paris, at the turn of the century, two young dancers meet in a rehearsal room. Warming up, each is very aware of the other. Tentatively they come together and then, caught up in the music, they dance. A blend of ballet, music and romance.

results.title: In a manner of speaking
results.creator_credit: Australian National Film Board and Colin Dean
results.brief_description: Illustrates how the telephone can be used to conduct efficient business, and how good habits will improve relations with clients on the telephone. Advice is given on aids to switch-board staff to generally facilitate service to clients. Camera and lighting by Frank Bagnall and George Lowe.

results.title: In a galaxy far far away  - me and my game
results.brief_description: Born and raised in Mildura, 15 year old Justyn Smith loves to play video games. It keeps him out of trouble and besides roaming around the streets of Mildura is boring anyway! This Digital Storytelling project was created in partnership with the Koorie Heritage Trust.

results.title: In a fishing port
results.creator_credit: Australian Broadcasting Commission, ABC-TV (Australia), Jean Richards and Frank L. Few
results.brief_description:
Shows a few days in the life of a daughter of a Port Franklin flounder fisherman, showing her at school, horse riding in the bush and helping her father in his fishing boat to lay nets and sort, clean and pack the fish.
Suitable for middle and upper primary levels.

results.title: In a Box
results.creator_credit: ONF | NFB, Robert Verrall and Eliot Noyes
results.brief_description: A short animated film of line drawings suggesting the predicament of people who find themselves boxed in by life. It takes only a few deft strokes of the animator’s pen to show how people’s lives are limited by their own view of things. The box they are in may not fit; it may be uncomfortable in many ways, but they rush back to its familiarity, if not security, even though brief sorties outside may show them a bigger world. (Awards: Columbus; Rome)
